name: vasos-and-sos-api
description: This packages shows an example of how to get [Virginia Secretary of State](https://cis.scc.virginia.gov/EntitySearch/Index) and use things like [Cobalt Intelligence Secretary of State API](https://cobaltintelligence.com/secretary-of-state) to get some really interesting business data. You can target specific keywords and even industries and get phone numbers and email addresses for these businesses.
